Interface VCanvasPlotter.PlottingListener

public static interface VCanvasPlotter.PlottingListener

A listener for listening to plotting events

Method Summary

          Called after the plotting has ended.

          Called just before the plotter starts plotting.

Called just before the plotter starts plotting. Good place for init stuff
